title: "Police department uses artificial intelligence to improve officer behavior"
excerpt: "A Colorado police department is using artificial intelligence to help its officers improve their behavior. The Aurora Police Department is one of 20 departments in the country that is using Truleo, a program that analyzes body camera footage and identifies potential problems."
